mapper.select: SELECT patient_id as patientId, patient_name as patientName, patient_age as patientAge, patient_sex as patientSex, patient_ssn1 as patientSsn1, patient_ssn2 as patientSsn2, patient_phone as patientPhone, patient_zip as patientZip, address, address_detail as addressDetail FROM patient
mapper.update: UPDATE patient SET patient_phone = #{patientPhone}, patient_zip = #{patientZip}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{addressDetail} WHERE patient_id = #{patientId}
